Doumen district of Zhuhai city 珠海市[Zhu1 hai3 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: Affected by the poor weather which has lasted for many weeks, lychee production in Doumen has decreased this year.
sentences.chinese: 受連日陰雨的影響，斗門荔枝今年的產量有所減少。

sentences.english: Test of introduced 6 varities of Pennisetum was conducted in Doumen area of Zhuhai city.
sentences.chinese: 對6個狼尾草屬牧草在珠海市斗門區進行引種試驗。

sentences.english: In addition to the Xinmen Vehicle-free Promenade, there are two real estate projects to be auctioned off.
sentences.chinese: 同時被拍賣的還有斗門區兩個房地產項目。

sentences.english: The reputation of Doumen bananas is spreading all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 斗門香蕉的美名正在傳遍全國各地。
